Load Provider API Dataset

Source: R/public_Dataset_Distribution.R
provider_Dataset.Rd

Load Provider API Dataset

Usage

provider_Dataset(dataset, fname = TRUE)

Arguments

dataset

<chr> dataset title

fname

<lgl> Is dataset a function name?; default is TRUE

Value

<Dataset> object

Examples

provider_Dataset("affiliations")
#> ══ Facility Affiliation Data ═══════════════════════════════
#> 
#> ☰ Rows 1,564,992 ☰ Fields 9 ☰ Pages 313 ☰ Resources 0 ☰
#> 
#>   This is the facility affiliations data publicly reported
#>   in the Provider Data Catalog.
#> 
#> • Timespan ❯ 2023-08-17 - 2025-02-13
#> • Modified ❯ 2025-01-31
#> 
#> ℹ Data Dictionary | Landing Page | References

provider_Dataset("clinicians")
#> ══ National Downloadable File ══════════════════════════════
#> 
#> ☰ Rows 2,610,829 ☰ Fields 31 ☰ Pages 523 ☰ Resources 0 ☰
#> 
#>   The Doctors and Clinicians national downloadable file is
#>   organized such that each line is unique at the
#>   clinician/enrollment record/group/address level.
#>   Clinicians with multiple Medicare enrollment records
#>   and/or single enrollments linking to multiple practice
#>   locations are listed on multiple lines.
#> 
#> • Timespan ❯ 2023-08-17 - 2025-02-13
#> • Modified ❯ 2025-01-31
#> 
#> ℹ Data Dictionary | Landing Page | References
